Footer.text: Zhivar Sanat Kian's services cover a wide range of activities related to engineering services, equipment supply, installation and commissioning, and operation (maintenance, manpower supply and management, etc.) of industrial and mining projects.

ServicesSection.title: Zhivar Sanat Kian Services
ServicesSection.description: Zhivar Sanat Kian, comprised of a young, experienced, and technically skilled team, was established in 2021 with the goal of playing a greater role in the country's development. The company has made remarkable strides in asset preservation, safety, environmental friendliness, responsibility, business ethics, innovation, and excellence. Leveraging its valuable experience in executing industrial projects, it has sought synergy to attract and undertake national projects. Equipped for the execution of large-scale industrial and mining projects, pump stations, water transmission pipelines, and water, oil, and gas treatment facilities, the company aspires to contribute more effectively to the prosperity and development of its homeland.

ProjectsSection.title: Recent Projects
ProjectsSection.description: Given the nature of large-scale projects, the execution complexities are increasing, with complex data, control systems, and safety measures becoming crucial. Moreover, higher expectations in productivity, reliability, safety, and the dynamic environments in which projects are executed further challenge design and execution teams. Based on this, Zhivar Sanat Kian Company has relied on its knowledge and experience, focusing on performance planning and optimization with a 'systemic approach' to achieve its goals and ensure optimal project execution, a summary of which is presented here.

commerce.title: Commerce & Project Supply
commerce.desc: In the complex world of trade, procurement is considered one of the most specialized areas of international trade. Zhiwar Sanat Kian, with experience and a brilliant track record in commercial affairs, is recognized by all economic actors as a prominent figure in the field of supply of goods and services, import, and export. The most important principles and needs in import and export include the provision of commercial and NIMA foreign exchange services, the process of domestic and foreign procurement, familiarity with the principles and techniques of domestic and international marketing, and transportation. All these processes are handled by Zhiwar Sanat Kian.

operation.title: Industrial & Mining Operations
operation.desc: The management and execution of commissioning, maintenance, facilities, and equipment, as well as training programs in industrial and mining sectors and other related processes, are carried out by Zhiwar Sanat Kian.

management.title: Industrial & Mining Management
management.desc: The changing nature of industries and the increasing complexity of new projects have driven Iranian companies to improve their capabilities and adopt new, systematic approaches to ensure successful project execution. Moreover, the adoption of modern approaches in management, construction, pre-commissioning, and commissioning in industrial projects is imperative.

about.title: About the Company
about.content: Zhivar Sanat Kian Company, consisting of a young, experienced team with technical knowledge, was established in 2021 with the aim of playing a more important role in the country's development. The company has been able to take impressive steps towards preserving customer assets, safety and environmental friendliness, responsibility, business ethics, innovation and excellence, and relying on its valuable experiences in implementing industrial projects and in order to attract and implement national projects, it has taken synergistic action and equipped itself for the implementation of large industrial and mining projects, pumping stations and water transmission pipelines, water treatment plant facilities, oil and gas, and hopes to play a greater and more effective role in the development of their dear homeland.

ceoMessage.title: CEO's Message
ceoMessage.content: Since the establishment of Zhivar Sanat Kian Company, by recruiting experienced managers familiar with production and operation complexes in various specialties, it has taken firm steps with extraordinary technical and specialized support to take over production line operations. Relying on the ability and expertise of executive, staff, commercial and support and welfare forces, it has been able to integrate warehouses and orders, commercial affairs, human resources, maintenance, part manufacturing, technical offices and with proper and timely supply and purchase of parts and equipment needed for production lines, to collect a complete information bank of suppliers, manufacturers and sellers of these parts. Zhivar Sanat Kian Company, based on the overlap of these talents and existing facilities, is able to provide all or a large part of the services expected by customers and manages large projects with the lowest cost and highest quality in every respect.

objectives.title: Company Objectives
objectives.content: Zhivar Sanat Kian Company operates with the aim of meeting the needs of customers and other stakeholders and increasing their satisfaction level within the framework of its defined policies. This company, as its main goal, focusing on quality, innovation and customer satisfaction, strives to have a superior position in the contracting industry and especially equipment supply. Our goals include providing superior and diverse services, accurate project execution and using international standards and maintaining customer satisfaction and trust. Another of our goals is to create a work environment appropriate to the capabilities and motivation of employees. We value professional development and creating growth opportunities for the company team. Also, by raising their level of expertise and technical knowledge, we try to reach a leadership position in this industry. Another importance that we pay attention to is the continuous improvement of operational processes and optimization of resource use in order to increase efficiency and effectiveness, and by focusing on these goals, we are looking to create a leading company in the contracting industry.

policy.title: Company Policy
policy.content: Zhivar Sanat Kian Company, believing in moving in the direction of sustainable development, organizational transformation, moving towards continuous improvement, while paying attention to the requirements of quality management systems, safety, health, environment, accepting economic and social responsibilities, has implemented planned monitoring and controls in its processes and activities and by managing them, has expressed its commitment to continuous improvement in relation to the requirements of the integrated management system including ISO 9001:2015, ISO 14001:2015, ISO 45001:2018 and in order to achieve its goals, has organized the main orientations of the company in the following axes:
points: Implementation of standards and legal requirements and efforts to meet customer demands
Identification, evaluation and effective control of environmental aspects, occupational safety and health hazards and compliance with related legal requirements
Training, maintaining and developing human capital, gaining employee satisfaction and creating effective participation opportunities in improvement activities
Management, development and updating of organizational processes and activities
Increasing equipment and machinery resources, developing work space and optimal planning and optimal use of resources
Effort to achieve quantitative and qualitative production assignment programs
policy.footer: The policy of this company and its determined goals have been communicated to all members of the company and are reviewed at specific time intervals. The management representative in management systems regularly reports the performance and effectiveness of the integrated management system to the CEO. All managers, officials and employees of the company consider themselves committed to active participation in performing duties and complying with the requirements of this system.

services.title: Company Services
services.intro: Zhivar Sanat Kian Company provides a wide range of services at the request of its customers as follows:
list: Operation services for production lines of industrial and mining factories
Providing all foreign and domestic commercial services, logistics and customs formalities
Production, maintenance, repair, improvement and safety services for factory lines
Supply of consumable parts, production support and implementation of 5S system
Services for supplying and managing required and related human resources for operation
Detailed design, engineering and project management
Engineering, supply and commissioning services for industrial and mining projects
Services for construction of oil, gas and petrochemical product transmission pipelines
Refinery projects and petrochemical facilities and power plant projects
Services for construction of water and gas transmission pipelines and mechanical pipeline operations
Providing technical inspection services and expediting construction
